whatsNew.title: Enhanced Risk Analytics
whatsNew.description: Advanced analytics dashboard with improved visualization and real-time risk assessment capabilities for better decision making.

whatsNew.title: Global Market Integration
whatsNew.description: Seamlessly integrate with global market data feeds for comprehensive risk landscape analysis and reporting.

upcomingFeatures.title: AI-Powered Recommendations

upcomingFeatures.title: Mobile Application
